features.name: Zombie Resilience
features.description: When you fall to 0 hit points, you regain 1 hit point at the start of your next turn.

features.name: Slam
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Zombie Grab
features.description: Save: DC 13 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is Grabbed (escape DC 13).

features.name: Devour
features.description: Require a grabbed, restrained or paralyzed target. Melee: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage and the target takes ongoing 6 damage (save ends, DC 13 CON).
